column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : If someone wanted to explore your beliefs , what should they read ?
#Text=PG : The Satanic Bible is the place to start , because that is the foundational literature for the organization .
#Text=All of Anton LaVey ’s books are worth reading .
#Text=The Satanic Witch is his compendium of Lesser Magic , which is our concept for how you manipulate people on a day-to-day basis to get them to do things in your favor .
#Text=It ’s geared toward women because we think it ’s fine for women to use their sexuality to get what they want .
#Text=It ’s part of nature , so go ahead !
#Text=Dress for success !
#Text=But it works for guys , too .
#Text=Whatever you have to charm people .
#Text=Glamor is worthwhile , so The Satanic Witch is useful for that .
#Text=He ’s got collections of essays , too , and The Satanic Rituals is more for a formal setting , where different cultures were examined to see what kind of diabolical imagery was in them .
#Text=Rituals can be fun to do in a large group setting ; but they ’re not anything you have to do .
#Text=Here ’s a Russian one , here ’s a French one ; here ’s a German one .
#Text=Here 's a Black Mass — what would that be like ?

#Text=In Satanism a Black Mass is not something we are running out and eager to do because as far as we ’re concerned , Christianity is a dead horse , unless in your life you feel there has been this really negative Christian influence that you need to purge , it ’s just kind of pointless .
#Text=And my book , The Satanic Scriptures , is worth reading , because it ties up where we have been , where we are now , and where we are going .
#Text=So if you only picked two , I would say read The Satanic Bible and The Satanic Scriptures , because then you ’ll have the book ends of the over forty year span of the Church of Satan .
#Text=On current events and politics
#Text=DS : I ’d like to give you some political situations and ask how a Satanist would handle them .
#Text=PG : Okay , but I want to preface that and say we do n't really determine people ’s political backgrounds .

#Text=We feel that each Satanist who is a member of the church must make those decisions based upon their own personal values , so there can be a wide range of answers depending upon the people you talk to , whether it be abortion , governmental decisions of going to war …
#Text=DS : You can just speak for yourself , then .
#Text=If you were President —
#Text=PG : — [ Laughs ] —
#Text=DS : — How would you handle the Israeli-Palestinian issue ?
#Text=PG : I do n't have a solution for that .
#Text=If I did , I would be out there telling people about it , because I do n't really see myself as a politician or arbiter of people ’s interactions with each other .

#Text=I can see that there are issues on both sides of the fence and that when people are fighting over a territory , generally speaking the folks who have the power win and then they write the histories and the world moves on .
#Text=But we have a situation here where there are bigger players behind the smaller nations , and it keeps this conflict enduring .
#Text=So they will either have to have compromise and discussion , or one side will have to destroy the other side and " win " and then move on , which is usually the way the world works .
